prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The evolution of programming languages has progressed from physical hardware manipulation to low-level machine code, and then to high-level languages like Python and JavaScript. The book argues that the next revolution in this evolution is writing software in natural human language.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
